alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 29 at 3:37AM EDT until August 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Richmond (Staten Island) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...From this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional Coastal Flood Statements are likely for the Wednesday and Thursday night high tide cycles.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
